channel.title: How to add items in shop?
channel.description: how can i ad items in a shop can any tell me that plz.

item.title: How to add items in shop?
item.dc:creator: @AndyJay123 AndyJay123
item.description:
@AndyJay123 wrote:

Open up Shops.cfg and here’s a quick tut/help guide.

Shop = ## - With ## being the next number after the previous shop = ##.
-Press Tab-
Then your shop name. Spaces are created by using the " _ " So General_Store is different to General Store.
-Press Tab 3times-, Then either “1 1” - For a General Store, or “2 2” so you can only sell items in the shop.
-Press Tab- Then enter your Item ID, -Then Tab- Then ammount to be sold.
Here’s an example…

shop = 66 Varrock_General_Store 1 1 1931 10 1935 10 1925 10 1923 10 1887 10 590 10 1755 10 2347 10 550 10

Read full topic
item.source: How to add items in shop?
